meanings.definition: Seven times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The septuple amount of candies made the children very happy.
meanings.sent2: She bought a septuple pack of pencils for the new school year.
meanings.sent3: The septuple scoop of ice cream was a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The septuple rainbow in the sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The septuple number of balloons filled the room with color.

meanings.sent1: He decided to septuple the recipe to feed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to septuple its production by next year.
meanings.sent3: She wanted to septuple her savings for a special vacation.
meanings.sent4: The magician seemed to septuple the number of flowers in his hat.
meanings.sent5: The gardeners had to septuple their efforts to meet the deadline.

meanings.definition: Consisting of seven parts or members.
meanings.sent1: The septuple puzzle was challenging to solve.
meanings.sent2: The team won the championship with their septuple victory.
meanings.sent3: The septuple-layered cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The septuple petals of the flower created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The septuple stars in the constellation shone brightly in the night sky.
